resources.string: You must have a valid network connection
Ensure that this device and the remote are connected on the same network.
You have to open the URL in your remote\'s browser
Tap here to select the files you wish to share.
Only the files which you have selected will be available for upload
Download the files in your remote
You\'re done! Your client\'s browser will download the selected files.
Tap here or on the upload button (Up arrow - top right corner) to start the server
The button must turn green indicating that the Server has turned on.
S E L E C T F I L E S
S E T T I N G S

WARNING: You are attempting to change the default HTTP port. Please ensure that the port is not blocked, reserved or is in use by other application. Non compliance may lead to problems with your network configuration.

Copyright \u00A9 reserved. No part of this software and all resources associated with the brand \'ServShare\' and \'ContrifyShare\' shall be used without prior permission. Distribution of software is free and all usage including commercial usage of this application is allowed as long as all usage are in purview of the copyright policy.
Implementation of Apache FTPServer is licensed by Apache License 2.0. Read about it at https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

This software has been tested in multiple testing conditions and various instances have been simulated to study the response and impact. The response and the impact of these studies were deemed to be satisfactory.

NETWORK INTERFERENCE: This software accepts connection on Port 53000 (Default) on the TCP/IP. This is an unreserved port so please ensure that this port isn\'t blocked or in use by other application or server. If it doesn\'t help, consider changing the port in the Settings.
This project is available on GitHub
GitHub is a registered trademark of Microsoft Corporation. \u00A9 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
Add files in the list to share
F I R S T R U N

Welcome to ServShare. This application needs to extract some additional files into your external storage. Please accept the prompt to allow storage rights to the application. Tap on EXTRACT FILES to continue.
If you have reset the application then the steps are also same.
This operation will reset the application to its original state. Any user information will be preserved.
R E C E I V E F I L E S
To receive the files from client to this host device, send files using FTP via any client. Use this configuration
YOUR FILES ARE STORED AT \"servshare_files\" directory in your selected location (in Settings).
INFORMATION: To change the user name or password, head to settings. Transmission of data is done without TLS.
Changing the username, password and port information is persistent.
Unable to find storage path. Restart application.
